## bmp-gen package

A library for asynchronously and procedurally generating bitmap image files (BMP).

## Remarks

Exposes an asynchronous API for procedurally generating bitmaps through [bmp()](./bmp-gen.bmp.md)<!-- -->, bitmap generator presets, and types for color management.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Color24](./bmp-gen.color24.md) | A class representing a 24-bit color. |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [bmp(width, height, procedure, opts)](./bmp-gen.bmp.md) | Generates a bitmap image of the specified width and height with the specified procedure. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BMPOptions](./bmp-gen.bmpoptions.md) | Bitmap generation options. |
|  [IColorRGB](./bmp-gen.icolorrgb.md) | An RGB color. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [checker](./bmp-gen.checker.md) | Returns a bitmap generator that alternates between <code>colorLow</code> and <code>colorHigh</code> every pixel. |
|  [fill](./bmp-gen.fill.md) | Returns a bitmap generator that fills every pixel with <code>color</code>. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BMPProcedure](./bmp-gen.bmpprocedure.md) | Procedural color generator for generating a bitmap. Passed the index and x and y coordinates of a selected pixel in the generation process. |
